cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

cards.name: Bloodcrazed Neonate
cards.text:
Bloodcrazed Neonate attacks each turn if able.
Whenever Bloodcrazed Neonate deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.

cards.name: Boggart Ram-Gang
cards.text:
Haste
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
cards.flavor: "We’re going to need a bigger gate." —Bowen, Barrenton guardcaptain

cards.name: Boneyard Wurm
cards.text: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
cards.flavor: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

cards.name: Boomerang
cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Returne from whence ye came..."
—Edmund Spenser, The Faerie Queene

cards.name: Calciderm
cards.text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Vanishing 4 (This permanent enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

cards.name: Cenn's Tactician
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature.
cards.flavor: "A well-trained force brings peace... which brings more time for training!"

cards.name: Circle of Flame
cards.text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.
cards.flavor:
"Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?"
—Chandra Nalaar

cards.name: Curse of the Bloody Tome
cards.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.

cards.name: Curse of Thirst
cards.text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of Thirst deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to him or her.
cards.flavor:
"May you drink until you drown but never be sated."
—Odila, witch of Morkrut

cards.name: Curse of Wizardry
cards.text:
As Curse of Wizardry enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"We must all push through the pain to heal our world."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

cards.name: Dauntless Dourbark
cards.text:
Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control.
Dauntless Dourbark has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

cards.name: Deathless Angel
cards.text:
Flying
{W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Duergar Hedge-Mage
cards.text:
When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact.
When Duergar Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Emeria Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Fiery Temper
cards.text:
Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Madness {R} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

cards.name: Gather the Townsfolk
cards.text:
Put two 1/1 white Human creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, put five of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.
cards.flavor: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.

cards.name: Golem's Heart
cards.text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: The heart of a golem gives life to more than just the iron husk around it.

cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer-both are attractive to thieves.

cards.name: Hada Freeblade
cards.text: Whenever Hada Freeblade or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Hada Freeblade.

cards.name: Hellspark Elemental
cards.text:
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hellspark Elemental.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Icatian Javelineers
cards.text:
Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.
{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Kalastria Highborn
cards.text: Whenever Kalastria Highborn or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Kor Duelist
cards.text: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
cards.flavor: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

cards.name: Kor Firewalker
cards.text:
Protection from red
Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor: "A river of lava is just another river to cross."

cards.name: Lava Axe
cards.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: "Catch!"

cards.name: Leatherback Baloth
cards.flavor: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Whenever the Llanowar elves gather the fruits of their forest, they leave one plant of each type untouched, considering that nature's portion.

cards.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
cards.text: Double strike
cards.flavor:
"Looks like we're completely outnumbered."
"Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

cards.name: Master's Call
cards.text: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

cards.name: Maul Splicer
cards.text:
When Maul Splicer enters the battlefield, put two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.
Golem creatures you control have trample.

cards.name: Mind Control
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?"
—Jace Beleren

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power."
—Rene Descartes, Discourse on Method

cards.name: Mogg Fanatic
cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"As if his chest had been a mortar, he burst his hot heart's shell upon it."
—Herman Melville, Moby Dick

cards.name: Mycoid Shepherd
cards.text: Whenever Mycoid Shepherd or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

cards.name: Naya Sojourners
cards.text:
When you cycle Naya Sojourners or it dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The elves had entered a land like an open grave-an act of fortitude or folly?

cards.name: Nearheath Stalker
cards.text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
cards.flavor: "Do not speak of this to the elders. They look unfavorably upon my indulgences."

cards.name: Nissa's Chosen
cards.text: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

cards.name: Oona's Blackguard
cards.text:
Flying
Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
cards.text:
Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.)
Pathrazer of Ulamog can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
cards.flavor: No thought but hunger. No strategy but destruction.

cards.name: Plague Myr
cards.text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

cards.name: Plague Stinger
cards.text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
cards.flavor: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

cards.name: Reckless Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: Bred for battle in the Grand Coliseum, these wurms annihilated whole ecosystems when released into the wild.

cards.name: Rise from the Grave
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
cards.flavor:
"Death is no excuse for disobedience."
—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Selkie Hedge-Mage
cards.text:
When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life.
When Selkie Hedge-Mage enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Shrine of Burning Rage
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: Shrine of Burning Rage deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

cards.name: Signal Pest
cards.text:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
cards.flavor: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

cards.name: Skinrender
cards.text: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

cards.name: Slave of Bolas
cards.text: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

cards.name: Sprouting Thrinax
cards.text: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

cards.name: Staggershock
cards.text:
Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Sylvan Ranger
cards.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

cards.name: Sylvan Ranger
cards.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

cards.name: Syphon Mind
cards.text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

cards.name: Tormented Soul
cards.text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
cards.flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Vault Skirge
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
cards.flavor: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

cards.name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
cards.text: Vigilance
cards.flavor: Every elf in Shadowmoor is charged from birth with a terrible duty: to strike back against the ugliness and darkness, even though they are all around and seemingly without end.

cards.name: Wood Elves
cards.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

cards.name: Woolly Thoctar
cards.flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

cards.name: Yixlid Jailer
cards.text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.
cards.flavor: He holds the keys to a tombful of incarcerated secrets.

cards.name: Zoetic Cavern
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
